description: Notification of change in status of the Abis connection between a BSC
and a TRX. There is an Abis connection per TRX.

Summary.eval: ($v3==1) ? 'BTS $v1 : TRX Abis link status is up' : 'BTS $v1 : TRX Abis link status is down'

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD VANU-GERAN-BTS-MIB::geranBtsTrxAbisLinkStatusNotification VANU-GERAN-BTS-MIB::geranBtsName s EXAMPLE VANU-GERAN-BTS-MIB::geranBtsTrxTeiValue i 9999 VANU-GERAN-BTS-MIB::geranBtsTrxAbisLinkStatus i 1

description: Configured Name for this BTS.
variables.name: VANU-GERAN-BTS-MIB::geranBtsName

description: Terminal Endpoint Identifier - The unique number in the BSS
that identifies this TRX. Same value as the index, repeated
for read-only access.
variables.name: VANU-GERAN-BTS-MIB::geranBtsTrxTeiValue

description: Operational Status of the Abis connection between a BSC and a TRX.
LinkUp(True)/LinkDown(False).
variables.name: VANU-GERAN-BTS-MIB::geranBtsTrxAbisLinkStatus

description: Notification of change in status of the LUMter connection to the BSC.

Summary.eval: ($v3==1) ? 'BTS $v1 : Connection between LUMter and BSC is up' : 'BTS $v1 : Connection between LUMter and BSC is down'

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD VANU-GERAN-BTS-MIB::geranBtsTrxLumterLinkStatusNotification VANU-GERAN-BTS-MIB::geranBtsName s EXAMPLE VANU-GERAN-BTS-MIB::geranBtsTrxTeiValue i 9999 VANU-GERAN-BTS-MIB::geranBtsTrxLumterLinkStatus i 1

description: Configured Name for this BTS.
variables.name: VANU-GERAN-BTS-MIB::geranBtsName

description: Terminal Endpoint Identifier - The unique number in the BSS
that identifies this TRX. Same value as the index, repeated
for read-only access.
variables.name: VANU-GERAN-BTS-MIB::geranBtsTrxTeiValue

description: Operational Status of the LUMter connection between a BSC and a TRX.
LinkUp(True)/LinkDown(False).
variables.name: VANU-GERAN-BTS-MIB::geranBtsTrxLumterLinkStatus

description: Notification of BTS startup.
Configured Name for this BTS.
variables.name: VANU-GERAN-BTS-MIB::geranBtsName

description: Notification of SDCCH misconfiguration with BSC. BSC attempted to
activate a SDCCH/4 channel, but BTS is only configured for SDCCH/8.

event.Summary: BTS $v1 : Misconfiguration of SDCCH with BSC

description: Configured Name for this BTS.
variables.name: VANU-GERAN-BTS-MIB::geranBtsName
